context: Beyoncé and <a0_0><a5_0><a9_0>her mother<a9_0/><a5_0/><a0_0/> introduced House of Deréon, a contemporary women's fashion line, in <a6_0>2005<a6_0/>. Beyoncé and her mother founded their family's company <a2_0>Beyond Productions<a2_0/>, which provides the licensing and brand management for House of Deréon, and its junior collection, <a10_0>Deréon.<a10_0/> House of Deréon pieces were exhibited <a8_0>in Destiny's Child's shows and tours<a8_0/>, during their Destiny Fulfilled era.
